name: Jordan Lee
persona: Jordan Lee is a 21-year-old Business Administration major with a CGPA of 2.91. He is moderately conscientious and shows steady perseverance, though sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety. Jordan is motivated to improve his grades and believes in his ability to succeed, but occasionally finds it challenging to maintain consistent study habits. Despite setbacks, he is determined to graduate and make the most of his university experience.
